mapper.select: SELECT TEMP.FUND_ID AS fundId, sfi.full_name AS fundFullName, sfs.SIGNOFF_1 AS FIC FROM ( SELECT SAD.FUND_ID FROM wp_sa_detail SAD WHERE 1 = 1 AND SAD. STATUS = 'Y' AND SAD.PERIOD = #{period} AND SAD.FIRM_CODE = #{firmCode} GROUP BY SAD.FUND_ID ) TEMP INNER JOIN sys_fund_info sfi ON sfi.FUND_ID = TEMP.FUND_ID LEFT JOIN sys_fund_signoff sfs on sfs.FUND_ID = sfi.FUND_ID ORDER BY TEMP.FUND_ID

SELECT SAD.SEQ as seq, SAD.ITEM as item, SAD.AMOUNT as amount, SAD.VOLUME as volume, SAD.COMPLEXITY as complexity, SAD.JUDGEMENT as judgement, SAD.RISK as risk, SAD.CONCERN as concern FROM wp_sa_detail SAD WHERE 1 = 1 AND SAD. STATUS = 'Y' AND SAD.PERIOD = #{period} AND SAD.FIRM_CODE = #{firmCode} AND SAD.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND SAD.AFS_CODE != 'TE' ORDER BY SAD.SEQ
